---
title: Voices
subtitle: Available Text-to-Speech (TTS) vendor configurations
slug: voices
description: Complete list of supported Text-to-Speech (TTS) vendors with their available languages, models, and voices.
---

This page provides a comprehensive list of all supported vendors for Text-to-Speech (TTS) services, along with their available configurations including languages, models, and voices.

## Text-to-Speech (TTS) Vendors

### Eleven Labs

Refer to the [ElevenLabs TTS Configuration Guide](./elevenlabs-TTS-recommended-configurations) for recommended settings.

**Value:** `eleven-labs`

**Available Models:**

| Value | Name |
|-------|------|
| `eleven_multilingual_v2` | Eleven Multilingual v2 |
| `eleven_turbo_v2_5` | Eleven Turbo v2.5 |
| `eleven_flash_v2_5` | Eleven Flash v2.5 |
| `eleven_turbo_v2` | Eleven Turbo v2 |
| `eleven_flash_v2` | Eleven Flash v2 |

### Cartesia

**Value:** `cartesia`

**Available Models:**

| Value | Name |
|-------|------|
| `sonic` | Sonic |
| `sonic-2024-12-12` | Sonic (December-2024) |
| `sonic-2024-10-19` | Sonic (October-2024) |

**Emotion Options:**

`anger:lowest`, `anger:low`, `anger:high`, `anger:highest`, `positivity:lowest`, `positivity:low`, `positivity:high`, `positivity:highest`, `surprise:lowest`, `surprise:high`, `surprise:highest`, `sadness:lowest`, `sadness:low`, `curiosity:low`, `curiosity:high`, `curiosity:highest`

**Speed Options:**

`slowest`, `slow`, `normal`, `fast`, `fastest`

**Supported Languages and Voices:**

### Open AI

**Value:** `open-ai`

**Supported Languages and Voices:**



English - en-US

|-------|------|
| `alloy` | Alloy |
| `ash` | Ash |
| `coral` | Coral |

| `shimmer` | Shimmer |

### Eleven Labs Streaming

**Value:** `eleven-labs-stream`

**Available Models:**

| Value | Name |
|-------|------|
| `eleven_multilingual_v2` | Eleven Multilingual v2 |
| `eleven_turbo_v2_5` | Eleven Turbo v2.5 |
| `eleven_flash_v2_5` | Eleven Flash v2.5 |
| `eleven_turbo_v2` | Eleven Turbo v2 |
| `eleven_flash_v2` | Eleven Flash v2 |

**Supported Languages and Voices:**

The language and voice options for Eleven Labs Streaming are identical to the standard Eleven Labs TTS vendor. Please refer to the [Eleven Labs](#eleven-labs) section above for the complete list of available languages and voices.

---

## Usage Notes

- All vendor values should be used exactly as specified (case-sensitive)
- Language codes should match the format provided in the tables above
- Voice IDs and model values are vendor-specific and must be used exactly as shown
- Some vendors support additional configuration options (e.g., Cartesia supports emotion and speed settings)
- For streaming vendors, ensure your implementation supports streaming protocols

## Get Support

Need help with vendor configuration? Reach out to us via `developers@interactly.ai` email. We're here to help!
